user_endpoint.description: The UUID of the endpoint to execute the function on

user_function.description: The UUID of the function to execute

args.description: args to the task, ie. 123, "hello world" or [456, "my string"]

kwargs.description: kwargs to the task, ie. {"first": 123, "second": "my string"}

tasks.description: Additional task inputs as a JSON array, if desired, i.e. [{'endpoint':'...', 'function':'...', 'args':[...], 'kwargs':{...}}]
